## Summary
- What changed
- Why this change is needed

## Scope
- Affected apps/packages:

## Validation
- [ ] `pnpm lint`
- [ ] `pnpm test`
- [ ] `pnpm build`
- [ ] (If web changed) `pnpm --filter web test:e2e`

## Checklist
- [ ] PR title follows Conventional Commits (`feat:`, `fix:`, `chore:`, ...)
- [ ] No secrets added
- [ ] Docs updated when behavior/config changed
- [ ] Breaking change documented (if any)
